title: ## Reading List: Complex Reasoning in NLP with PLMs (2023 and Earlier
This list focuses on articles exploring complex reasoning capabilities of PLMs, including
**"Reasoning with Language Models: A Survey"**
by Liu, et al
container-title: - Comprehensive survey of reasoning tasks and techniques in NLP, including PLMs

title: **"Towards a Unified View of Reasoning in Natural Language Processing"**
note: by Camburu, et al. - Discusses different reasoning paradigms and their application to NLP.

title: **"Reasoning with Language Models: A Comprehensive Survey"**
note: by Liu, et al. - Updated version of the 2022 survey, incorporating recent advancements.

title: Reasoning with Knowledge:**
by Liu, et al. - Explores how to integrate external knowledge into PLMs for improved reasoning
**"Reasoning with Knowledge Graphs: A Survey"**
by Wang, et al
container-title: - Focuses on using knowledge graphs to enhance reasoning capabilities of PLMs

title: **"Commonsense Reasoning with Language Models: A Survey"**
- Examines the use of PLMs for commonsense reasoning tasks
**"Logical Reasoning with Language Models: A Survey"**
- Reviews different approaches for logical reasoning with PLMs
**"Learning to Reason: A Survey of Deductive and Inductive Reasoning in NLP"**
by Camburu, et al
container-title: - Explores both deductive and inductive reasoning in NLP, including PLMs

title: **"Towards Robust and Explainable Logical Reasoning with Language Models"**
by Liu, et al
container-title: - Focuses on improving the robustness and explainability of logical reasoning with PLMs

title: **"Causal Reasoning with Language Models: A Survey"**
- Reviews the use of PLMs for causal inference and reasoning
**"Learning to Reason about Causality with Language Models"**
by Zhao, et al. - Explores how to train PLMs to perform causal reasoning tasks
**"Causal Inference with Language Models: A Survey"**
note: by Liu, et al. - Updated survey on causal reasoning with PLMs, including recent advancements.

title: **"Multi-Hop Reasoning with Language Models: A Survey"**
- Reviews different approaches for multi-hop reasoning with PLMs
**"Learning to Reason over Multiple Hops with Language Models"**
by Chen, et al. - Explores how to train PLMs to perform multi-hop reasoning tasks
**"Multi-Hop Reasoning with Language Models: A Comprehensive Survey"**
note: by Liu, et al. - Updated survey on multi-hop reasoning with PLMs, including recent advancements.

title: **"Reasoning with Language Models for Question Answering"**
- Explores the use of PLMs for question answering tasks that require complex reasoning
**"Reasoning with Language Models for Text Summarization"**
by Zhao, et al. - Explores the use of PLMs for text summarization tasks that require complex reasoning
**"Reasoning with Language Models for Dialogue Systems"**
by Liu, et al. - Explores the use of PLMs for dialogue systems that require complex reasoning
Challenges and Future Directions:**
**"Challenges and Opportunities in Reasoning with Language Models"**
by Camburu, et al. - Discusses the challenges and future directions for reasoning with PLMs
**"The Future of Reasoning with Language Models"**
- Provides a vision for the future of reasoning with PLMs
**Note:** This list is not exhaustive and there are many other relevant articles published in recent years. You can find more articles by searching for keywords like "reasoning
